name: EmotionRoll
description:
Kick the dice to change your emotions and defend from incoming hordes of forest critters. Each emotion is signified by a color and will grant a small buff.  A/D to move and SPACE to kick. Your heart can only take 3 hits before breaking so defend it well!

Joy (Yellow) - Makes the die bouncier

Sadness (Blue) - Slows down enemies

Apathy (Grey) - Allows your heart to tank one extra hit from an enemy

Disgust (Green) - Makes your kick bigger

Anger (Red) - Makes your kick inflict more force on the die

Fear (Purple) - Makes you move faster
